item.description:
Hi , just want to let everyone know about a cool movie coming to town called the "Caferteria Man"  it's about a NH native, Tony Geraci who started a positve food movement one school district at at time. After the movie a panel discussion follow the movie  featuring educational experts.

Learn more about how locally grown foods can increase the nutritinal value of foods that students eat and how this contributes to sustainability!

Local Nutritious Food + Public School Lunch =healthier Food Choices for Our Children!

Free and open to the public.

For more info call: 603-742-2900 or if anyone has any questions.

I'm going so if anyone would care to join me that would be great!

Hope to see some of you there!

 Peter

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Cafeteria Man
